summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North and East Sixty-fifth Street, from Sunnyside Avenue to Ravenna Boulevard; Sixth Avenue Northeast, from East Sixtieth Street to East Sixty-fifth Street; Hillman Place and Fourth Avenue Northeast, each from East Sixtieth Street to East Sixty-fifth Street; Hillman Place and Fourth Avenue Northeast, each from East Sixtieth Street to East Sixty-fifth Street; Latona Avenue, from East Sixty-first Street to East Sixty-fifth Street; East Sixty-first Street, East Sixty-second Street, East Sixty-third Street and East Sixty-fourth Street, each from First Avenue Northeast to Latona Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing sewers therein of proper dimensions and materials, together with all wyes, manholes, catch basins, flush tanks and other appurtenances necessary for the proper sewering and draining of said district, in accordance with Resolution No. 1953 Budget of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
